CHAT.comment: JANETTE PRICE, WARDEN, Petitioner v. DUYONN ANDRE VINCENT.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ARTHUR A. BUSCH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY A. LAMKEN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID A. MORAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ARTHUR A. BUSCH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
